text: The Switch E1 is a single-decker electric bus. It has a low-floor. It is made from 2022 to the present day by Switch Mobility. The E1 is the first bus to be made by Switch Mobility since their rebranding from Optare in 2020. In 2022, It replaced the Optare Tempo SR and Optare Versa. == References == Category:Low-floor buses Category:Switch Mobility Category:Battery electric buses
title: Switch E1
